alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 31 at 10:44AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Aransas, southeastern Nueces and southeastern San Patricio Counties through 1130 AM CST... At 1044 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Texas A&M University Corpus Christi, or 10 miles east of Corpus Christi, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Port Aransas, Ingleside, Aransas Pass, Ingleside On The Bay, Mustang Island State Park and Corpus Christi Naval Air Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Nueces Islands
